column2: ILLINOIS DMV WRITTEN TEST
Question Text
1. Illinois drivers can use a cellphone that is not hands-free only:
column4: While parked on the shoulder of a road.

column2: 2. ______ is used for parks and recreation signs.
3. The ‘Slower Traffic Keep Right’ sign is used:
4. If driving in foggy weather, drivers should turn on their high-beams to increase the field of vision.
5. This sign warns that:
column4: the bridge ahead is wide enough for only one vehicle at a time.

column2: 6. Where are yield signs usually placed?
column4: Where major roads lead into  auxiliary roads.
column6: At intersections, if there is no marked stop line.
column8: Where auxiliary roads lead into major roads.

column2: 7. This sign means:
column4: Parking is not allowed at 8:30 AM and at 5:30 PM
column6: No parking between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.
column8: You can only park between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.

column2: 8. How can you prevent fatigue on a long trip?
column4: Plan to drive long trips with a companion.

column2: 9. While you are in an intersection waiting to make a left turn, the traffic signal light turns red. You should:
column4: wait in the intersection until the light turns green again.
column6: back up from the intersection after making sure it is clear.
column8: yield to oncoming traffic and complete the turn.

column2: 10. What happens if two vehicles reach at the same time an intersection with four-way stop signs?
column4: The first vehicle to reach the intersection must yield.
column6: The driver on the right yields to the driver on the left.
column8: The driver on the left yields to the driver on the right.

column2: 11. Where must a pedestrian walk when there are no sidewalks?
column4: On the side of the road, facing the traffic.
column6: On the side of the road, in the same direction of traffic.
column8: In the middle of the road, facing oncoming traffic.

column2: 12. Drivers may pass on a two-lane roadway marked with a single solid yellow line on their side of the center line.
13. Which shape is a speed limit sign?
14. The yield sign means:
column4: You must come to a complete stop.
column6: Drive with caution in wet weather.
column8: Slow down and give vehicles crossing your path the right-of-way.

column2: 15. This regulatory sign tells drivers that:
column4: traffic in the right lane must go straight.
column6: all vehicles must turn left immediately.
column8: traffic in the left lane must turn left at the intersection ahead.

column2: 16. Parking is not allowed:
column4: in an intersection, unless permitted by signs.
column6: within 300 feet of a pedestrian safety area.

column2: 17. ___________ normally are white rectangles with black letters or symbols.
18. When you have completed a left turn from a two-way street into a one-way street, your car should be:
column4: in the left lane of the street.
column6: in the right lane of the street.
column8: in the center of the street.

column2: 19. If a driver follows you too closely, you should:
column4: move to another lane if possible.

column2: 20. When passing a truck, you should let the driver know you are passing by blinking your headlights, especially at night.
21. When on a two-lane roadway, drivers must stop their vehicles when approaching a stopped school bus with its red warning lights flashing and its stop signal arm extended.

22. You are stopped at a stop sign and you are going to go straight through the intersection. A car on the cross road has stopped at a stop sign on your right and is going to go straight. Who has the right-of-way?
23. This road sign means:
24. This road sign means:
25. A merge sign means drivers should be prepared to change lanes or allow other traffic to come into their lane.
26. In Illinois, the use of hands-free devices while driving is:
column8: allowed for drivers ages 19 and older.

column2: 27. Aggressive driving includes:
column6: quick lane changes without a signal.

column2: 28. This road sign means:
29. As you drive on the expressway, make sure:
column4: your directional signal goes off before you change lanes.
column8: you cut off vehicles behind you when you change lanes.

column2: 30. This sign means:
column4: Bicycles should yield to vehicles ahead.
column6: Warning: a bikeway crosses the roadway ahead.
column8: The lane ahead is reserved for bicycles.

column2: 31. You want to turn left at an intersection ahead. A car reaches the intersection from the opposite direction and moves straight ahead. You:
column4: may not enter the intersection to prepare for your left turn if the light is green.
column6: can turn left. You have the right of way.
column8: must wait for the car to go through before you turn.

column2: 32. Parking a vehicle is prohibited within __ feet of a fire station driveway.
33. When an authorized vehicle using its sirens and flashing lights approaches a vehicle, the driver should pull to the right-hand edge of the roadway and wait for the emergency vehicle to pass.
34. If a driver is arrested for driving with a BAC of .08 percent or more, his/her driving privileges will be suspended for:
35. This sign indicates:
